page.title: 14Marion,W.Ashby farmer's wife
page.content: I arise between 7a.m.-7-30a.m.Make a cup of coffee and get breakfast.Pack school lunch for Carl and take him to school 2 miles away in Horncastle.Do any shopping at same time.Back to housework.My day always depends on the season.At hay-making time and harvest-time I help by putting the bales on the elevator.There are usually a few trips backwards and forwards fetching my husband from the farm.Lunch is 12-30pm to 1.0pm.I fetch Carl from school at 3-15pm.If beasts are going to slaughterhouse I help sort them out and pen-up seperately . Tea is at 5pm.There are usually jobs like gardening or cutting grass to be done after tea.Carl gets ready for bed at 7pm.and has a story.I finally relax at 8pm.I usually sit and read or knit. Bedtime is usually 10-30pm. to 11pm.
